participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and analytical, enjoys outdoor activities and problem-solving.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Friendly and ambitious, passionate about sports and helping others.
participant_2.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. i am currently in high school. i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.
